summary: 2002 FORD WINDSTAR STRUCK BROADSIDE BY A OLD CIERA ON RIGHT SIDE.  RIGHT SIDE OF CAR WAS LIFTED UP, THEN CAR CAME BACK DOWN.  EITHER COLLISION OR NEAR-OVERTURNING POPPED THE LEFT CENTER SEAT (CAPTAIN STYLE SEAT) LOOSE FROM FLOOR.  INJURIES IN CRASH WERE NOT RELATED TO SEAT FAILURE.  SEAT WAS NOT OCCUPIED.
